name: Tartaros (krokofant)
description:
After tricking the gods once again Sisyphus was sentenced to death. As a last-ditch effort you made a deal with Ares, the god of war himself. You are condemned to try out his newest inventions against the horrors of Tartaros in an seemingly eternal attempt to defeat Hades´ minions.

First of all, don´t feel bad about dying! It´s a part of the game. Whenever you die, you enter a new world.

While you do loose all your items, you can lock rooms by placing a rune within the room. By doing so it respawns at the exact same location upon your death, including items!

W: move forward
A: move leftwards
S: move southwards
D: move rightwards

Space: attack

G: Place/Pick up a rune
